column4: How do I install the .33 kernel, I need the full btrfs ioctls. Is there a ubuntu way to install a newer kernel, or do I just to the old "copy the config, make oldconfig, make gconfig, make, make install" routine?
grab the source and then cd to it and do make menuconfig
then you need to put the bzImage it gives you in /boot/kernel too and alter grub
there might actually be a easier method but im not 100%
